Resources for translating Python into R:
https://rstudio.github.io/reticulate/articles/r_markdown.html

```{r setup, include=F}
library(reticulate)
Sys.which("python")
use_python("/usr/bin/python")
```

```{python}
import numpy as np
my_python_array = np.array([2,4,6,8])
for item in my_python_array:print(item)
```

```{r}
my_r_vector <- as.vector(py$my_python_array)
class(my_r_vector)
```

```{python}
my_python_array2 = r.my_r_vector
print(my_python_array2)
```
